title: _SET_PLAYER_HEALTH_RECHARGE_LIMIT

0xC388A0F065F5BC34// SetPlayerHealthRechargeLimit
void _SET_PLAYER_HEALTH_RECHARGE_LIMIT(Player player, float limit);Parameters:player: The local player ID.limit: A value between 0.0 and 1.0, 0.5 is default.
codeBlocks:
local player = source
-- Example usage for _SET_PLAYER_HEALTH_RECHARGE_LIMIT
_etPlayerHealthRechargeLimit(player, 0.0)
